comment.text: "This is the URL of the Single Logout endpoint for the IdP. It should be entered by administrators to enable Single Sign-On. This field appears in a settings page."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "عنوان رابط لنقطة نهاية تسجيل الخروج الفردي لمزود الهوية" is overly literal and somewhat awkward.  While technically correct, it doesn't flow naturally in Arabic. A more idiomatic translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: عنوان URL لنقطة نهاية تسجيل الخروج الآمنة لمزود الهوية

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly an error, the use of "URL" is preferable to "رابط" in a technical context. Using the English term alongside the Arabic equivalent can improve clarity for a technical audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: عنوان URL/رابط لنقطة نهاية تسجيل الخروج الآمنة لمزود الهوية

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Single Sign-On' is translated as 'Birdəfəlik Çıxış'. While 'Birdəfəlik Çıxış' literally means 'one-time exit,' it's not the standard or widely understood translation for 'Single Sign-On'. A more accurate translation would incorporate the concept of unified authentication.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'Single Sign-On' as 'Müəyyən İstifadəçi Giriş-Çıxış' or 'Birlikdə İstifadəçi Giriş-Çıxış', or using the English term 'Single Sign-On' if the audience is technically savvy.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Nöqtə' is likely a misspelling. The correct word should be 'Nöqtəsi'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'Nöqtə' with 'Nöqtəsi'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "URL адрес на крайна точка за единичен изход на доставчика на самоличност" is overly literal and a bit cumbersome. A more natural and concise Bulgarian translation would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL на крайна точка за изход на доставчика на самоличности (IdP)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'URL адрес' which is slightly redundant. 'URL' is sufficient in Bulgarian, especially in technical contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL на крайна точка...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Adresa URL koncového bodu jednotného odhlášení IdP' is a very literal and somewhat clunky translation. A more natural and fluent Czech phrasing would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Možnosti: 'URL koncového bodu pro odhlášení IdP', 'Adresa pro odhlášení IdP', or simply 'Odhlášení IdP'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'jednotného odhlášení' is grammatically correct but a more concise form might improve readability in UI/technical contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a shorter phrasing such as 'odhlášení'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL des Single-Logout-Endpunkts vom IdP' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'IdP Single Logout Endpoint URL'. The 'vom IdP' (from the IdP) is not idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL des Single-Logout-Endpunkts des IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "URL τελικού σημείου ενιαίας αποσύνδεσης παρόχου ταυτότητας" is overly literal and technically correct but not the most natural or concise way to express 'IdP Single Logout Endpoint URL' in Greek. A more fluent translation would be preferable for better user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Διεύθυνση URL εξόδου ενιαίας σύνδεσης παρόχου ταυτότητας

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the long phrase can be difficult to read. Consider breaking it up or using a more concise wording.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing for better readability; perhaps using a shortened version like 'URL εξόδου παρόχου ταυτότητας' if context allows.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "URL del punto de conexión de cierre de sesión único IdP" is overly literal and somewhat clunky in Spanish. "IdP" is understood by technical users, but a more user-friendly translation would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL de salida única del IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "cierre de sesión único" is a standard term but can be improved for better flow. Combining it with 'salida' creates a more natural sound.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL de salida única del IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'IdP Yksittäisen uloskirjautumisen päätepiste URL' is overly literal and not the most natural phrasing in Finnish. 'Yksittäisen uloskirjautumisen' is a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP:n uloskirjautumispäätepiste URL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes a colon after 'IdP' which is unnecessary and might disrupt consistency with other similar keys.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP uloskirjautumispäätepiste URL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'IdP' is an abbreviation and should be consistently used throughout the translation. While understandable, it's more technically accurate to keep the abbreviation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Keep 'IdP' instead of fully spelling it out.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "IdP Ելքի Միակ Վերջնակետ URL" is a literal translation of 'IdP Single Logout Endpoint URL'.  'Միակ' (single) might not be the most natural word choice in Armenian when describing a logout endpoint. A more accurate and idiomatic translation might emphasize 'dedicated' or 'specific'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP Ելքի Անխաղարկելի Վերջնակետ URL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, keeping the 'URL' at the end, mirroring the English, might feel slightly less natural. It's often preferred to integrate it within the phrase.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP Ելքի Վերջնակետ URL-ը

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL dell’endpoint di accesso singolo IdP' is a literal translation but doesn't convey the intended meaning as naturally in Italian. 'Single Sign-On' is commonly referred to as 'Single Sign-In' (SSO) in Italian. 'Endpoint di disconnessione IdP' is a more accurate and common phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL dell’endpoint di disconnessione IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "IdP Single Logout URL ຈຸດສິ້ນສຸດ" is not a complete or accurate translation of "IdP Single Logout Endpoint URL". While 'URL' is present, 'ຈຸດສິ້ນສຸດ' primarily translates to 'endpoint' but is somewhat clunky and may not be immediately understandable. A more natural translation would incorporate the concept of an endpoint more directly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP Single Logout URL ທີ່ສິ້ນສຸດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The inclusion of 'IdP' in the Lao translation might be confusing for Lao speakers unfamiliar with the English acronym. While acceptable, it's worth considering if a more general term can be used or if the acronym needs further explanation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing 'IdP' or adding a brief explanation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "IdP vienas atteikšanās galapunkta vietrādis URL" is not a natural or accurate translation of "IdP Single Logout Endpoint URL". "Atteikšanās" is a general term for rejection or denial, not specifically logout. "Vietrādis" is often used for relay stations, not URLs.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP vienreizējās izrakstīšanās galapunkta URL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'URL' is often used directly, it might be more appropriate to use the Latvian equivalent, especially for broader audience appeal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP vienreizējās izrakstīšanās galapunkta vietrādis

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'IdP Single Logout Eindpunt URL' is too literal and doesn't flow naturally in Dutch. 'Eindpunt' is technically correct but sounds awkward in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP Single Logout URL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Eindpunt' is acceptable, 'URL' being in English is inconsistent with the rest of the Dutch phrase. It might be better to translate 'URL' as well.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP Single Logout Afsluitings URL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'IdP URL do Ponto Final do Fim de Sessão Único' is overly literal and verbose. A more natural Portuguese translation for 'IdP Single Logout Endpoint URL' would be something like 'URL do Ponto de Saída Único do IdP' or 'URL do Endpoint de Logout Único do IdP'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL do Ponto de Saída Único do IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Fim de Sessão Único' is a bit clunky. It would read more naturally as 'Saída Único' or 'Logout Único'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Saída Único

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL do terminal de logout único IdP' is not the most natural or accurate rendering of 'IdP Single Logout Endpoint URL'. 'Terminal' doesn't quite convey the intended meaning of 'Endpoint' in this context. It sounds overly literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL do ponto de saída único IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the Romanian translation is overly literal and sounds unnatural. 'Furnizorului de identitate' is clunky. A more natural translation would be something like 'al sistemului de autentificare' or 'al furnizorului de identități'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL punct final de deconectare unică al sistemului de autentificare

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes an abbreviation (IdP) in parentheses without explaining it in the English source. While understandable to some, a more consistent approach would be to use the full term or provide a brief explanation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL punct final de deconectare unică al furnizorului de identitate (IdP - Identity Provider)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Russian translation includes a colon after 'IdP:' which may not be necessary and may disrupt the flow of the text depending on its usage context. Consider removing it for consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL-адрес конечной точки единого выхода IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation 'IdP තනි නික්මෙන අන්තයේ ඒ.ස.නි.' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "IdP Single Logout Endpoint URL".  'ඒ.ස.නි.' (A.S.N.) is likely a misunderstanding of URL and doesn't make sense in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would require understanding the full context of 'IdP Single Logout Endpoint URL' and translating 'URL' appropriately. Potential suggestions include: 'IdP තනි ලඝූත්පාදන අවසාන ස්ථානය (URL)' or 'IdP තනි නික්මෙනුමේ අන්තස්ථමනය (URL)' depending on the desired level of formality and audience. Replacing 'ඒ.ස.නි.' with the Sinhala term for 'URL' is crucial.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The addition of the abbreviation 'ඒ.ස.නි.' (A.S.N.) is unexpected and disrupts the flow of the translation. It's unclear why it was added.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'ඒ.ස.නි.' completely from the translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL koncového bodu s jedným odhlásením IdP' is a literal translation and could be improved for clarity and flow in Slovak. 'Single Sign-On' is often abbreviated as SSO, and 'Endpoint' can be more naturally expressed. The phrase 's jedným odhlásením' is somewhat awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL koncového bodu pre odhlásenie IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the use of 'IdP' is acceptable, but using the full term 'poskytovateľa identity' might be preferable for broader comprehension.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL koncového bodu pre odhlásenie poskytovateľa identity

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'IdP končna točka URL enkratne odjave' is overly literal. A more natural Slovenian phrasing would be 'URL končne točke odjave IdP' or 'IdP URL končne točke odjave'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL končne točke odjave IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The order of 'IdP' and 'URL končne točke odjave' feels unnatural in Slovenian. Placing 'IdP' at the end is more common in this type of technical terminology.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL končne točke odjave IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "URL крајње тачке за jеднострано одјављивање од стране пружаоца услуга" is too verbose and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "IdP Single Logout Endpoint URL". It includes unnecessary phrases like "од стране пружаоца услуга" (by the service provider). A more accurate and concise translation is needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL крајње тачке за одјављивање једног пријављивача (IdP)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation includes a space before the parenthesis. This is generally considered a formatting error in Serbian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL крајње тачке за одјављивање једног пријављивача (IdP)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "URL krajnje tačke za jednostrano оdjavljivanje od strane pružaoca usluga" is overly verbose and doesn't accurately reflect the concise nature of the English phrase 'IdP Single Logout Endpoint URL'.  'Pružalac usluga' (service provider) isn't directly implied in the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL za iskljucivanje (Single Logout Endpoint URL) ili URL za iskljucivanje

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian text contains a Cyrillic character (о). It should be Latin script, as specified in the prompt ('Serbian (Latin)').
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'о' with 'o'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL-адреса кінцевої точки єдиного виходу постачальника посвідчень' is overly literal and complex for a UI element label.  'Постачальника посвідчень' translates to 'identity provider', which is too technical for the user. A simpler and more understandable translation is preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL-адреса виходу з єдиного входу

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'URL-адреса' is slightly clunky. It's more common to just use 'Адреса'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Адреса кінцевої точки єдиного виходу

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "URL điểm cuối đăng xuất một lần IdP" is technically correct but a bit clunky and not idiomatic. 'Một lần' is redundant because 'đăng xuất một lần' already implies 'single'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL điểm cuối đăng xuất IdP
